messages.content: Reply user's question as accurately as possible.

You are given a JSON object array called "Seeds", e.g.:
[{"SeedID":3001,"SeedText":"Mars rover transmitted new images of the Jezero Crater."},{"SeedID":3002,"SeedText":"Scientists analyze soil samples for signs of ancient water."}]

For each Seed within in "Seeds", produce an array of roughly 4 three-word sentences following the rules…

Regarding tone: casual, upbeat

Return a JSON array of objects, each with SeedID and RawBaselineIsms, matching the C# schemas RawBaselineIsm and RawConcat.

[{"SeedID":3001,"RawBaselineIsms":[{"position1":"Rover","verbText":"sends","position2":"Images","sentimentType":"positive"},{"position1":"Crater","verbText":"looks","position2":"Mystic","sentimentType":"neutral"},{"position1":"Signal","verbText":"hits","position2":"Earth","sentimentType":"neutral"},{"position1":"Data","verbText":"streams","position2":"Fast","sentimentType":"neutral"}]},{"SeedID":3002,"RawBaselineIsms":[{"position1":"Scientists","verbText":"test","position2":"Samples","sentimentType":"neutral"},{"position1":"Soil","verbText":"hints","position2":"Wet","sentimentType":"positive"},{"position1":"Water","verbText":"once","position2":"Flowed","sentimentType":"positive"},{"position1":"Research","verbText":"grows","position2":"Deep","sentimentType":"neutral"}]}]
Reply user's question as accurately as possible.
